Que buena banda Polkadot Stingray

Cosmos lowered the barrier but devs still manage validators, security & infra.
Avalanche subnets gave flexibility but require resources to run.
Polkadot parachains brought shared security, but entry needs auctions + setup.

Good ideas, but still complex.

Each cycle we see infra projects promising to make launching chains easier:

Cosmos gave us appchains

Avalanche gave us subnets

Polkadot gave us parachains

But all still left heavy lifting for developers.
üßµ Tanssi vs Cosmos, Avalanche & Polkadot ‚Äî why Tanssi is different https://t.co/lYONPcmHLw
